# Solicitation for Unedd Vacuum Truck Services for Liquid Hazardous Waste Removal at CFB Esquimalt

## Details of the Solicitation

* Solicitation Title: Unedd Vacuum Truck Services for Liquid Hazardous Waste Removal
* Solicitation Number: W0103-249741
* Publication Date: 2023-12-01
* Closing Date: 2023-12-12 12:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-12-12

## Procurement Information

* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: British Columbia
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia, Canada, Victoria

## Overview of the Requirements

The Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor for the removal and disposal of liquid hazardous waste at CFB Esquimalt. The services required include vacuum truck services for the collection and disposal of approximately 240,000 liters of saltwater and 60 liters of 3% AFFF mixed from C Jetty.

## Mandatory Technical Criteria

* The contractor must be able to take up to 80,000 liters per day for 3 consecutive days
* The contractor must be able to provide a 50ft hose

## Invitation to Bid

This solicitation is open to all qualified contractors who hold a valid Supply Arrangement under EW479-162880/XXX/NCS. Interested contractors must submit a proposal in either English or French.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarification regarding this solicitation, please contact:
- Melanie Henley
- Email: [Melanie.Henley@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Melanie.Henley@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (236) 464-3342
